effect.x-y: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.

short_effect.x-y: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

flavor_text.x-y: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.
